statements: SELECT * FROM Payments WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT payment_id, payment_amount FROM Payments WHERE payment_amount > 500;
SELECT payment_date, payment_amount FROM Payments WHERE customer_id = 200 AND policy_id = 300;
SELECT * FROM Payments WHERE payment_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT customer_id, SUM(payment_amount) AS total_payments FROM Payments GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM Payments WHERE payment_amount > 1000 ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT payment_id, payment_amount, payment_date FROM Payments WHERE customer_id = 101 AND payment_amount < 500 ORDER BY payment_date ASC;
SELECT AVG(payment_amount) AS average_payment FROM Payments WHERE payment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT customer_id, SUM(payment_amount) AS total_payments FROM Payments GROUP BY customer_id HAVING SUM(payment_amount) > 5000;
SELECT * FROM Payments WHERE policy_id IN (SELECT policy_id FROM Policies WHERE policy_type = 'Car Insurance') ORDER BY payment_amount DESC, payment_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Payments WHERE payment_id = 1
SELECT payment_id, amount, payment_date FROM Payments WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY payment_date DESC
SELECT customer_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM Payments GROUP BY customer_id
SELECT * FROM Policies WHERE customer_id = 2 ORDER BY start_date
SELECT policy_id, policy_type, premium FROM Policies WHERE premium < 500
SELECT * FROM Payments WHERE payment_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY amount DESC
SELECT customer_id, policy_id, amount FROM Payments JOIN Policies ON Payments.policy_id = Policies.policy_id WHERE Policies.policy_type = 'Home'
SELECT customer_id, SUM(amount) AS total_paid FROM Payments GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY total_paid DESC
SELECT customer_id, AVG(premium) AS average_premium FROM Policies GROUP BY customer_id HAVING count(policy_id) > 2
SELECT payment_id, amount, payment_date FROM Payments WHERE amount > 1000 AND payment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-01'
SELECT * FROM Payments WHERE payment_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, amount FROM Payments WHERE policy_id = 10;
SELECT payment_id, customer_id, amount, payment_date FROM Payments WHERE payment_id < 5;
SELECT * FROM Payments WHERE payment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Payments ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM Payments WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM Payments GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM Payments WHERE payment_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT policy_id, AVG(amount) AS avg_amount FROM Payments GROUP BY policy_id HAVING avg_amount > 500;
SELECT MAX(amount) AS max_amount, MIN(amount) AS min_amount FROM Payments;
SELECT * FROM Payments;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customers WHERE customer_phone LIKE '%123%';
SELECT payment_amount, payment_date FROM Payments ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT policy_name, policy_type FROM Policies WHERE policy_start_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT transaction_type, transaction_description FROM Transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customers WHERE customer_phone = '+1234567890';
SELECT transaction_type, transaction_date, transaction_description FROM Transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT policy_name, policy_type, policy_end_date FROM Policies ORDER BY policy_end_date DESC;
SELECT payment_amount, payment_date FROM Payments WHERE payment_amount > 1000 AND payment_date <= '2022-03-15';
SELECT * FROM Payments JOIN Customers ON Payments.customer_id = Customers.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_name, address FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT policy_type, premium FROM Policies WHERE premium > 1000;
SELECT payment_amount, payment_date FROM Payments ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT insurer_name, insurer_address, phone_number FROM Insurers;
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_name, address FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT policy_type, premium, start_date FROM Policies WHERE premium > 1000 ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT payment_id, payment_amount FROM Payments JOIN Customers ON Payments.customer_id = Customers.customer_id WHERE Customers.customer_name LIKE 'A%';

SELECT transaction_id, transaction_type, transaction_date FROM Transactions JOIN Payments ON Transactions.payment_id = Payments.payment_id WHERE Payments.payment_amount > 500 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
